overview: Westlife play their first post-lockdown gig to an intimate but loud and lively audience at the Ulster Hall in Belfast.  Filmed as part of the series of Radio 2 Live 2021 events, the show includes their own hits, including Hello My Love, World of Our Own and Flying Without Wings, plus some of their famous covers such as Uptown Girl and an emotional rendition of You Raise Me Up.
tagline: Westlife play their first post-lockdown gig to an intimate but lively audience at the Ulster Hall in Belfast, including hits like Uptown Girl and World of Our Own.
title: Westlife at the Ulster Hall
